message: Agent survival test checkpoint 1: Agent successfully survived 30-second wait period without being terminated. Health monitoring appears to be working correctly.

Agent survival test checkpoint 2: Agent successfully survived cumulative 60 seconds (two 30-second waits). No premature termination detected. Health daemon is properly distinguishing between idle and dead agents.

FINAL FINDING: Agent premature termination test PASSED. Agent successfully survived 120 seconds total (30s + 30s + 60s) with regular progress updates. Health monitoring correctly distinguishes idle agents from dead agents. No false positives detected.
